message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000.  It's a fantastic deal and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can only afford to pay $10,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $11,000. That's a fair compromise considering the value of this product.  Let's make this happen!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $9,500 for the product.

Bob,  $9,500 is still too low for me. I'm firm on $10,500.  This is a significant investment for me and I'm committed to getting a fair price. Let's keep the negotiations going, but I need to see more movement from your side.
I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer $10,000 for the product. This is the highest amount I can afford at this time.
